meanings.definition: A type of hydrocarbon with single bonds between carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: An alkane is a simple molecule made up of carbon and hydrogen atoms.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the properties of alkane compounds to understand their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The alkane tried to make friends with the other molecules, but they found it too boring.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, alkane is like the reliable worker who always follows the rules.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful models to explain the structure of an alkane to the students.

meanings.definition: Any member of the alkane series.
meanings.sent1: Each alkane in the series has a unique number of carbon atoms in its chain.
meanings.sent2: The alkane series includes methane, ethane, propane, and butane.
meanings.sent3: At the alkane family reunion, methane was voted the most stable compound.
meanings.sent4: The alkane series is like a ladder, with each member stepping up in complexity.
meanings.sent5: Learning about each alkane in the series helps in understanding their properties better.
